channel.title: A Survey of RPG podcats stats
channel.description:
[Admin - not sure if this is the right place for this discussion, if not tell me and I'll repost where appropriate]
Hello friends, I'm trying to understand how well (or not well) my RPG podcast is doing but I have no other RPG podcast stats for comparison, so I've created this survey for RPG podcats. It'll help a lot if you could pass this link to any RPG podcast and I'll be happy to share the results & insights of the survey with anyone who will be interested.
The survey: https://forms.gle/FCLc3cGwBeSGWcvg6
